content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a response from the AI with a command to search for the "brno reservoir trail california" on Google. My computer returned a list of websites related to trail running and great views in Brno, Czech Republic, as well as tourist attractions in Catalina Island. However, the "browse_website" command did not work when I tried to find the most beautiful places to visit in California.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "xdg-open https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno/trail-running/brno-reservoir-trail"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: Error: This Shell Command is not allowed.', type='action_result')]
"""
